itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Advent 2022 Is Here!
title: Bonus Episode: Advent 2022 Is Here!
description:
Join Raechel and Amanda for a bonus podcast episode to celebrate the launch of She Reads Truth’s Advent 2022 collection. What is Advent? Why do we celebrate it? How can you join the She Reads Truth community in reading Scripture every day this Advent season? Join us for this exciting episode as we answer these questions and begin to prepare for the Advent season together! 


Shop the Advent 2022 collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com/collections/advent-2022. 


Sign up for the She Reads Truth subscription box and we’ll send you our newest study book every month so you never have to wonder what to read next.Visit ShopSheReadsTruth.com/subbox and get the monthly subscription box today!

While you are shopping, sign up for our text message program at ShopSheReadsTruth.com — you’ll get early bird access to our biggest deals, restock alerts, and special offers!
